mapper.sql: id, ename, cname, password, style, menu_type, erased, login_count, last_login_time, create_time
mapper.insert:
select case when max(id) is null then 1 else max(id)+1 end as "id" from fui_user
insert into fui_user (id, ename, cname, password, style, menu_type, erased, login_count, last_login_time, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{erased,jdbcType=BIT}, #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

mapper.update:
update fui_user
ename = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
erased = #{erased,jdbcType=BIT},
login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fui_user set ename = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, erased = #{erased,jdbcType=BIT}, login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id AS "id", ename AS "ename", cname AS "cname", password AS "password", style AS "style", menu_type AS "menuType", erased AS "erased", login_count AS "loginCount" from fui_user where ename = #{userCode}

SELECT
FROM fui_user WHERE 1 = 1
AND ename = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND cname LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND id in (select user_id from fui_user_organizations where organization_id=#{orgId})
